intro: Pterostigma macrophyllum, commonly known as the large-leaf pterostigma, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Cucurbitaceae. It is characterized by its broad, heart-shaped leaves that can reach up to 30 centimeters in length. The plant produces yellowish-green flowers with five petals, which bloom in the summer months. Its fruits are elongated, cylindrical berries that contain several seeds. This plant is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, thriving in humid, well-drained soils.
